com.tguzik.annotations

Annotation Type ExpectedFailureProfile


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface ExpectedFailureProfile
    Attempts to communicate when user would know that failure happened.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Tomasz Guzik

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      ExpectedFailureProfile.Kind value
      How the annotated type/method handles failures?

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int retries
      How many times does the type/method retry before giving up?
      ExpectedFailureProfile.Transactional transactional
      Does the failure corrupt internal state?

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract ExpectedFailureProfile.Kind value
        How the annotated type/method handles failures?

      • transactional

        public abstract ExpectedFailureProfile.Transactional transactional
        Does the failure corrupt internal state? Can object be reused after failure?
        Default:
        com.tguzik.annotations.ExpectedFailureProfile.Transactional.UNKNOWN

      • retries

        public abstract int retries
        How many times does the type/method retry before giving up?
        Default:
        0
